name: Fist of South East
description:
Part of LevelUp KL 2021 Game Jam
Fist of South East is first person brawler made by me as part of SEA Game Jam 2021. The game is very simple where you must fight enemies and reach to the end to get the crown.

Key inputs:
WASD - Basic Movement
Left Mouse Button - Punch (you spam the button to make combo)
Right Mouse Button - Heavy Explosion
V - Kick

Known issues

  • There's audio delay issue if you play on minimum requirement
  • If character's hand not appeared after using heavy  explosion or punch, try spam right mouse button and left mouse button to make it appear
System Requirement Minimum Recommended  OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version) OS : Windows 7/10 (64-bit version) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Processor: Intel Core i7-3770/AMD FX-8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Memory: 8GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 720M or better Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 or better
